question: Who wrote, One - Dimensional Man: Studies in the Ideology of Advanced Industrial Society?
explanation: In 1964, Herbert Marcuse's wrote One - Dimensional: Studies in the Ideology of Advanced Industrial Society , in which he dwelled on the theme of alienation in contemporary western society. He gave a penetrating critique of Capitalism as regards its impact on human freedom. He held that capitalism exercises monopolistic control not only on production and distribution, it also creates the desire and demand for commodities through a clever manipulation of the mass media.
